thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Prince Montmartre - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A memorable short stay in Paris
thread.title_full: A memorable short stay in Paris - Review of BEST WESTERN Prince Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sujadh
title: A memorable short stay in Paris
text:
We arrived in the morning and welcome with a hot coffee as the weather is very cold. Room got ready in few minutes and we were allocated a street view in top floor room.
Room is specious for a couple, neat and clean. This hotel is located in 10 minutes walking distance to metro station. That saves us lots of time and help us to visit most of the places in Paris in our two nights stay.
All team members are very friendly and always ensure we are happy with everything. They also suggest us where to go and what to do around.
I would highly recommend to stay in this beautiful hotel in Paris and experience the true hospitality with their talented team members
